column8: July 07 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has placed the ratings of Aetna Inc.  (Aetna) on Rating Watch Negative. The rating action follows Aetna's recent  announcement that it has reached an agreement to acquire Humana Inc. (Humana) in  a cash and stock transaction valued at approximately $37 billion.
